quest.name: The Mysterious Assailant
journal: Urokuzu is searching high and low for an experienced fighter.
objectives: Survey the area and slay any beasts that appear.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Ah, you are a ladyman from above and one who appears to be a battle-hardened warrior, no less! That you should choose this very moment to visit usâ”€it is no coincidence!

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: The other day one of our younger Kojin was out fishing when he was attacked and seriously injured. He was unable to identify his assailant, but many suspect it might be the doing of a coralshell. Around this time they begin laying eggs and can be very aggressive.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: I, however, believe it to be something far more sinister than that. The individual I speak of is Tamamizu's most gifted fighter. A mere coralshell would not be able to catch him unawares.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: The incident took place on the northern shores of the Isle of Bekko. Please, might you go there and investigate what could have been behind this?

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: Do be careful. I do not want to have your death on my consciousness.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: ...So the Kojin of the Red were the culprits? This is an outrage! While we are by no means on friendly terms, they have never attempted to murder one of our own until now.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: ...Then again, perhaps they were not aiming to take his life but were simply looking to steal the ancient rod he was using at the time. It is, after all, one of our most valuable treasures.

dialogue.name: UROKUZU
dialogue.text: I must warn the others to take extra precautions when leaving the village with anything that can be considered to be of great worth. Thank you, madamsir, for your assistance in shedding light upon this most troubling matter.
